

/*************

DOCUMENTATION ON RECURSION OF METHODS (THE FACTORIAL EXAMPLE) 1.10

************/

public class MyClass {


    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub


                // Step 1: Call the Factorial method and store the result in a valiable 

                float result = (float) factorial((5));


                // Step 2: Print the result

                System.out.println("Factorial of 5: " + result);
            }


            
            // Step 3: Define the factorial method


            public static float factorial(float n) {


                // Step 4: Check if the value of n is 0 or 1 (base case)


                if (n == 0 || n == 1) {

                    // Step 5: If n is 0 or 1, return 1

                    return 1;

                } else {

                    // Step 6: If n is not 0 or 1, call the factorial method recuesively with n - 1

                    // Step 7: Multiply the current value of n with the result of the reculsive call

                    return n * factorial(n - 1);
                }
            }

}
